definition.name: File Existence
definition.description: GitHub Action to check for file existence
definition.author: André Storhaug

inputs.name: files
inputs.description: Comma separated string with paths to files and directories to check for existence.

inputs.name: ignore_case
inputs.description: Ignore if a file has upper or lower cases.

inputs.name: follow_symbolic_links
inputs.description: Indicates whether to follow symbolic links.

inputs.name: fail
inputs.description: Makes the Action fail on missing files.

inputs.name: allow_failure
inputs.description: This variable is deprecated in favour of "fail".

outputs.name: files_exists
outputs.description: Whether the file(s) exists or not.

evidence.reasoning: This action checks for the existence of files, which is a common testing practice to ensure that necessary files are present in the repository. It also contributes to code quality by ensuring that the expected files are available.
